name: K.A.S.E.
description:
This is actually a DEMO of the first and second level, don't hesitate to give us feedback so that we can make the game better. :)

We need your help! If you have some time fill this form please!
https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1dnKJTGPZNbiuK_mLERA54iilZ1PbS61qObgxAH4iOt0/viewform

Need: Xbox 360 or Xbox One controller

Third year project, created at ICAN Paris by:

Esther Berges - Programmer and chief project
Benoît Cohin - Game Design, Level Design
Stéphane Jérisian - Sound Design
Emmanuelle Kasztelan - Artist
Hugo Retault - 3D Artist

Factsheet of K.A.S.E
Name: K.A.S.E
Pitch: Take control of a little robot called Klink and use his powers to interact with the environment in order to create your own path!
Genre: Platformer, adventure
Platform: Computer & Next gen consoles
Release Date demo version: 30/05/2016

Follow our robot on TWITTER: https://twitter.com/Kase_klink
Read our DEVBLG: http://klinkgameofficial.wix.com/kase
Follow us on TUMBLR: http://kaseklink.tumblr.com/
Like us FACEBOOK: https://www.facebook.com/KASEGAME/
